/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of natural beauty and urban development.
